tool.name: Aurora Skewer
tool.description: A fast and accurate adapter trimmer for next-generation sequencing paired-end reads

regex.description: Check the warnings_and_errors.txt file for more details.

param.name: adapter_x
param.label: Adapter sequence file for the first reads

param.name: adapter_y
param.label: Adapter sequence file for the second reads

param.name: end_quality
param.label: 3’ end quality trimming
param.help: Trim 3’ end until specified or higher quality reached. The default value is 0.

param.name: mean_quality
param.label: Reads filtering by average quality
param.help: Specifies the lowest mean quality value allowed before trimming. The default value is 0.
